product_name: Scarpa Charmoz Pro GTX Mountaineering Boots - Women's
long_description: Answer the call of the mountains and conquer high-altitude peaks in the lightweight women's Scarpa Charmoz Pro GTX mountaineering boots. Nylon L-Tech uppers are reinforced with Lorica(R) synthetic leather to offer long-lasting protection and abrasion-resistance. Gore-Tex(R) liners make these boots waterproof yet breathable, for comfort in a variety of conditions; nylon linings are highly breathable and wick moisture away. Articulated ankles allow freedom of movement; friction zones and full rubber randing give edging performance. Dual-density EVA midsoles supply lightweight cushioining; nylon composite supports offer stiffness without excessive weight. Vibram TT Lite outsoles offer excellent grip, stability and durability without weighing you down. Heels are reinforced with polyurethane for enhanced crampon fit and performance. The Scarpa Charmoz Pro GTX mountaineering boots are compatible with hybrid crampon binding systems. All-synthetic construction makes the Charmoz Pro GTX mountaineering boots vegan friendly.
short_description: Answer the call of the mountains and conquer high-altitude peaks in the lightweight women's Scarpa Charmoz Pro GTX mountaineering boots.
